parameters: \pop[2]Taylor was definitely easy-going, and has opened up the most to me.
\pop[2]Aside from Kyron, he's the only other person who's told me about his vision.
\pop[2]That clearly made a difference in how much we were able to bond.
\pop[2]It's almost like a wall that needs to be broken before we can move forward.
\pop[2]I start to wonder what Isaac's vision was. Dante's, too.
\pop[2]As far as Klace goes, I can only imagine that his is extremely concerning.
\pop[2]But they still remained a mystery to me. All three of them.
\pop[2]I knew that Isaac's was positive, and that it had to do with our current situation.
\pop[2]Klace's was bad enough that he had a business card for the \c[23]Vision Protection Program\c[0].
\pop[2]But Dante? I don't think he's said a single thing about his.
\pop[2]Is he taking stories from his future like Klace did with his music?
\pop[2]All I can do is think back to that day when we made a pact against fate.
\pop[2]They weren't in touch in any of their visions anymore. Not even an afterthought.
\pop[2]Even in the certainty of their visions, there's still so much uncertainty.
\pop[2]Hopefully I can get them to open up, and share a little more.
\pop[2]Yet, I'm seeing it with my own two eyes.
\pop[2]They stand there, giving me that smirk again.
\pop[2]This isn't real. This can't be real.
\pop[2]I shake my head, but they're still there.
\pop[2]A moment later, they hold up their hand.
\pop[2]Nobody else in the room seems to be aware of their presence.
\pop[2]Why are they doing this to me? I \c[14]need\c[0] to know.
\pop[2]They taunt me with symbols of my guilt. My regrets.
\pop[2]A testament to every act of folly since I arrived.
\pop[2]I start to rush toward them, maintaining eye contact.
\pop[2]They need to tell me why! I need to-
\pop[2]I bump into Dante, and stumble back.
\pop[3]Whoa, just who I was looking for...!
Having a good time so far, Delta?
I can barely taste the booze in these things.
\pop[2]I can tell he's already drunk. At least a little.
\pop[2]But I choose to take him up on his offer, and have another.
\pop[2]We were already halfway there. To the fourth and final midnight.
\pop[3]You know, it's almost our time to hang out.
I've been looking forward to this night for a while now.
Ever since Taylor suggested the whole Quantum Leap thing.
\pop[3]I'm a sucker for big moments, though.
And like I say, New Year's Eve is one of the best.
Super glad we get to spend one of these midnights together.
\pop[2]I smile, yet feel nothing but fright on the inside.
\pop[2]That's not even what I wanted to say to him...
\pop[2]But the agent just vanished. Like a figment of my imagination.
\pop[2]That's impossible. I know I wasn't hallucinating. It was \c[14]real\c[0].
\pop[2]Making me see things. Feel things. \c[14]Do\c[0] things.
\pop[2]Or perhaps I'm just saying that to absolve myself of some guilt...
Looks like you zoned out, there.
\pop[2]I shake my head and tell him that everything is fine.
\pop[3]Wanna take your drink and go someplace quiet?
Maybe my room? You know, like when we first hung out.
\pop[3]Just don't try and get me to spill any plot secrets.
After a few drinks, who \c[14]knows\c[0] what I'll say.
\pop[2]I've been silent on a lot of stuff myself, lately.
\pop[2]Maybe that's it. I've been bottling everything up inside.
\pop[2]Let's just hope that sometime soon, I can let it all out...
\pop[2]We enter his room, and he immediately turns off his monitor.
\pop[3]Oops. Can't be letting anyone see my writing.
Not by choice, of course. I just don't want to get sued.
\pop[2]We both take a sip of our drink.
\pop[2]Honestly, I'm almost done with all the booze.
\pop[2]It was good to party for the first couple weeks, though.
\pop[2]In fact, part of me hopes we go through all the booze that Klace bought.
\pop[2]The party is pretty loud, and I can tell that everyone has had a few.
\pop[3]So, I actually wanted to give you something.
I meant to do this earlier, but I saved it for tonight.
\i[2]"Oh? I like where this is going."
\i[6]"As long as it doesn't involve treason. I've had enough of that."
\pop[3]No problem. Always happy to give gifts to my friends.
I just hope that you don't find this one too sappy, or anything.
\i[2]"Oh? I like where this is going."
\pop[2]He says my name in a stern fashion, but he's clearly joking.
\pop[3]You sure know how to add to the moment.
Just a sec. I hope you don't find this gift too sappy.
\i[6]"As long as it doesn't involve treason. I've had enough of that."
Isaac's sure strapped us in for a wild ride, huh?
\pop[3]Figured I might as well do this while I still have the chance.
I just hope you don't find the gift too sappy, or anything.
\pop[3]I know you've never really read my work.
So I wanted to give you something special.
\pop[2]He walks over to his bookshelf, and takes something out.
\pop[2]After he hands it over, I inspect it.
\pop[2]It's an autographed copy of one of his novels.
\pop[3]Well, I hope it's not weird that I consider my own work a gift.
But this \c[14]is\c[0] a first-edition copy. There aren't many out there.
\pop[3]It was part of a test run, to see if the book could sell.
After it did well, they printed way more.
\pop[2]I remember Klace mentioning he had a first-edition copy as well.
\pop[3]It's also the one with the character that reminded me of you.
\pop[2]I think he means the character that dies...
\pop[3]I'm always a bit hesitant to give away my own books.
A lot of people just think I'm full of myself, or something.
\pop[3]But I consider my work an extension of myself.
Like I always say, the purest form of self-expression.
\pop[3]So to me, it's like I'm giving a piece of \c[14]myself\c[0] away.
Imagine doing that, and then getting shut down.
\pop[3]It happens way more than you think.
That's why I'm so selective about it.
\pop[3]I was pretty sure it wouldn't fall flat on \c[14]you\c[0], though.
So in my mind, you're one of the good ones.
\pop[2]That's pretty flattering, and I understand his intent.
\pop[2]I don't really think of this as a self-serving gesture.
Make sure to tell me what you think.
Don't worry, I'm \c[14]way\c[0] too familiar with criticism.
\pop[2]He smiles at me, and rubs the back of his head.
\pop[3]Everything going on lately has got me thinking a \c[14]lot\c[0].
With how uncertain tomorrow is, I need to seize every moment.
\pop[3]Especially if I want my vision to come to pass...
\pop[2]He sits down on the edge of his bed, and taps the spot beside him.
\pop[2]I guess he doesn't consider me a stranger anymore. That's nice.
\pop[2]I join him, placing my drink on the nightstand beside me.
\pop[3]I know how I told you about reconnecting with my family.
Well, to be honest, it was more than just wishful thinking.
\pop[3]It's not that I \c[14]want\c[0] to do it.
It's more like, I know I'll do it regardless.
\pop[3]So why get in the way of progress, right?
\pop[2]He takes a sip of his drink.
Happy, laughing - not a care in the world.
\pop[3]I have a brother, too. That one was a shock to me.
But that's all there is to it. One big, happy family.
\pop[2]A guarantee of reconciliation is a big deal.
\pop[3]I didn't really think about reconnecting with them until recently.
I guess seeing them almost every day was enough...?
\pop[3]I don't even know if this makes any sense, but...
Even after I ran away from home, they still kept me company.
\pop[3]Knowing that my vision would happen again?
It got me through some rough nights.
A far cry from how I left things when I ran away.
\pop[3]That, and there's no place more lonely than a library.
Trust me. I wouldn't wish \c[14]that\c[0] fate on my worst enemy.
\pop[2]Grew up in a library, and used it to hone his skills as a writer?
\pop[2]Abandoning family he knew he'd reconnect with through his vision?
\pop[3]I have that vision to thank for my independence, too...
\pop[3]Sometimes, when you run away, you never know what'll happen.
I guess I was graced with the knowledge that it'd only be temporary.
\pop[3]That made it a \c[14]lot\c[0] easier to pull the trigger.
I guess part of me knew we'd be happy again in the future.
\pop[3]But it's been a \c[14]long\c[0] time since then.
They haven't reached out, so I think it's \c[14]my\c[0] turn.
\pop[3]I wonder if they've read my novels, you know?
Or for that matter, what my brother's name is.
Didn't bring you here to put you to sleep.
\i[0]"I'm always here for a friend in need."
It may be healthy, but it's not easy.
Opening your past wounds never is.
It's so easy to judge people after they vent.
I'm just... I'm just glad that it didn't sour your perception of me.
\i[0]"I'm always here for a friend in need."
If you ever need to talk? Hit me up.
With what we're going through? It's okay to be worried.
\pop[2]I can hear the partygoers counting down in the backyard.
\pop[2]It looks like third midnight was finally here.
\pop[2]I stand up from the bed, and turn to face Dante.
\pop[2]Our eyes lock, and I feel emotion coursing through me.
\pop[2]Everything he told me? I can see it all in his eyes.
\pop[2]The pain, the loneliness - but the hope, too...
\pop[2]Part of me wonders what he sees in mine.
\pop[2]We hug each other, securing a tight embrace.
\pop[2]It lasts for a while, but it doesn't feel awkward in any way.
\pop[2]I realize this is the first time we've ever been this close.
\pop[2]When the hug ends, he steps back, and looks into my eyes again.
\pop[3]You know, I've honestly just been stalling since I'm nervous.
\pop[3]Well, you know how I said that book was like a part of myself...?
\pop[3]There's a reason I wanted \c[14]you\c[0] to have it.
After you read it, you'll know me so much better.
\pop[3]Even if you don't realize it, you still will.
Each word is my heart \c[14]poured\c[0] onto the page.
\pop[3]And I wanted you to have it...
\pop[2]He rubs the back of his head, clearly nervous.
\pop[3]So, since you'll be getting to know me better...
I was wondering if I could have the honor of doing the same.
\pop[3]Not to myself, I mean. Wow, I'm ruining the moment.
I just think it would be cool if we spent more time together!
\pop[3]Especially after all this \c[23]Argus\c[0] nonsense comes to an end...
I know you're already dating within the group, but that won't be an issue.
\pop[3]Especially after all this \c[23]Argus\c[0] nonsense comes to an end...
I know you're not with anyone right now, so I just thought I'd try.
\i[2]"A date? It would be my honor."
\i[5]"We can get to know each other better, but just as friends."
\i[2]"A date? It would be my honor."
\pop[3]Wow. Talk about a happy new year.
Thanks, Delta. This is gonna be my best one yet.
\pop[2]He places his hand in mine, and brings it to his lips.
\pop[2]Kissing the top of it softly, he releases his grip and smiles.
\pop[3]I can think of a few cool places to go.
But right now? We've got a party to get to.
Don't want to miss that fourth and final midnight.
\i[5]"We can get to know each other better, but just as friends."
You're so mysterious, you know that?
\pop[3]And I can \c[14]never\c[0] resist a good mystery.
It's in my nature as a writer.
We've got a \c[14]party\c[0] to get to.
\pop[2]We leave the room, hopeful for a great end to the Quantum Leap.
\pop[2]Isaac would be spending fourth midnight with me. I'm kind of nervous.
\pop[2]Whatever surprise he had planned, he's sure been tight-lipped about it.
